about_the_game:
Civilization has fallen. Join the Horde, launch yourself to the Zone and die purging the Hellspawn invasion in the humanity's last stand while competing for the highest scored Hellruns on the official leaderboards with other players!

Choose violence

  • Hordes signature Ultraviolent gameplay combined with 2.5D physics will put a smile even on the most conservative face. Shoot, slice, burn, electrocute, blow-up and pulverize hundreds of enemies at the same time. Combining kills also adds score multiplier (and makes you look like a pro).

Jump in anytime!

  • Each Hellrun is divided to different Zones, that need to be purged from the Hellspawn to advance into the next one. Typical Hellrun only takes a few minutes. Perfect time killer for a coffee break or when skipping work!

Competitive multiplayer

  • Anti-social, single played multiplayer experience! Challenge other players directly in THE RETRIBUTION mode and beat their Hellrun scores asynchronously. Online leaderboards and punishing daily challenges included as well!

Unlimited replayability

  • Permadeath, seed based procedurally generated gameplay, dynamic weather, incredible realistic violence modeling and 2.5D physics combined with huge variety of weapons, enemies, power-ups, maps, secrets and bosses will give bang for your buck while keeping you busy!

Boomer shooter

  • Just like in the good ol' days! Think Doom, Alien Breed, Hotline Miami and Tetris had a baby on steroids.

Kick-ass soundtrack

  • We guarantee: The combination of acid house, techno and game tunes from the 80's and the 90's will make the killing as easy as breathing.

Skill-based gameplay

  • Remember the times when video games whooped everyone's asses? Those days are back: Stand your ground and fight!

NO early access, NO bulls*it!

  • Buy the ticket, take the ride. Horde will be fully released in 2025.

content_descriptors.notes: Some people may find Horde's ULTRAVIOLENT gameplay and post-apocalyptic themes distressing. Product is strongly recommended for adult audiences only.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra and above
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800) or equivalent / Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM) or equivalent / GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor & operating system and skill to kill effectively while not dying

Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor & operating system and skill to kill effectively while not dying
